author: Amelia Lucas
title: Uber's ex-CEO Travis Kalanick's bet on ghost kitchens ushers in a wave of VC interest
description: As food delivery booms thanks to third-party services like DoorDash and UberEats, venture capitalists look to ghost kitchens as the next way to cash in.
content:
A Sweetgreen location in Bethesda, Maryland.
As CEO of Uber, Travis Kalanick joined the likes of DoorDash and GrubHub in shaking up the restaurant industry with third-party food delivery. After his ouster, he's kept changing it through a controlling stake in… [+7658 chars]
